title: BTC Monk
author: BTC Monk
content: https://scarce.city/auctions/bitcoin-thinker-artwork-&-tokenhttps://youtu.be/qpk4CyJjeGQwww.twitter.com/BTCmonk1Bitcoin Thinker artwork symbolises head space where we often find ourselves when decision need to be made with regards to Bitcoin. Hold, buy or sell is the question we often face within our minds.Artwork was inspired by the sculpture "The Thinker" made by French sculptor Auguste Rodin in 1904.Bitcoin Thinker artwork was made on plywood, coated with five layers of black charcoal lacquer and sanded in between every layer for the foundation. Then the drawing was gilded with 22 carat gold leaf and covered in four layers of clear lacquer with sanding in between every layer. For the finish of the artwork it was polished and framed in authentic black matte frame.Dimensions: without frame 52 x 76 cm (20 x 30 inch). With frame 57 x 81cm (22,5 x 32 inch)Weight: 1kg ( 2.2 pounds)
